1376390.name: Apocrypha
1376390.description:
Apocrypha is a magical PvPvE action game where each player becomes a mage striving for glory and power. The Aether winds fill this unique world with magic, rich in valuable resources and dangerous monsters.

PvPvE Extraction

Gameplay includes:

  • Exploration

  • Defeating monsters

  • Loot collection

  • Boss fights

  • Fights with other mages

Day and Night

During the day, you can explore the world enjoying relative safety but modest rewards. When night falls, portals open through which you can escape with loot or stay and risk for more valuable rewards. Raise the stakes, as enemies become scarier and more dangerous at night, competition intensifies, but the loot can be truly legendary!

Team Deathmatch

Gameplay includes:

  • Team vs. team battles

  • Tactical combat interactions

  • Completing main and side objectives on maps

  • Battle rewards depend on the contribution to the team's victory

  • Ability to play in ranked mode (in the future)

Duels

1-on-1 battles against another player. Opponent matching depends on the character's power points. Craving for revenge? Challenge them to a duel!

Magic in Apocrypha: Assemble your spell like a constructor!

In the world of Apocrypha, magic is not just a tool, it's an art. Every mage here can assemble their spell and customize it to the smallest detail. Want to enhance damage? Add control over the opponent? Or maybe make the spell more stable? The choice is yours!

Create your spell

Apocrypha offers you endless possibilities for experimenting and customizing spells inherent to your chosen character class. Whether it's destructive attacks or defensive barriers, it all depends on your skill and imagination.

Magic is a dangerous thing!

But be careful! Magic is not only power, but also danger. Careless use of powerful and unstable spells can lead to unpleasant consequences not only for your enemies but also for yourself.

The deep combat system provides wide opportunities for combat

Using special abilities, players can manipulate the battle and seize the initiative, implementing their favorite play style.

Apocrypha is a world where every mage can become a legend!
